INDICATOR_NAME: Rural poverty gap at national poverty lines (%)
SOURCE_NOTE: Rural poverty gap at national poverty lines is the rural populations mean shortfall from the poverty lines (counting the nonpoor as having zero shortfall) as a percentage of the poverty lines. This measure reflects the depth of poverty as well as its incidence.
SOURCE_ORGANIZATION: World Bank, Global Poverty Working Group. Data are compiled from official government sources or are computed by World Bank staff using national (i.e. country–specific) poverty lines.
